mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select dish.id, dish.name, dish.category_id, dish.price, dish.image, dish.description, dish.status, dish.update_time, category.name as category_name from dish left join category on dish.category_id = category.id where dish.id = #{dishId} order by dish.category_id asc , dish.status asc
